comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Henry O'Neil de Hane Segrave (1896-1930), British fighter pilot; after the war, he set land and water speed records, before he died in a lake crash, age 33; his wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Henry_Segrave

comment.author: 34911459@N08
comment._content: pennylrichardsca: thanks for the full name and additional information.  We will add it to the record.
